basics.name: José Rafael Hernandez
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I'm a web developer working in the field since 2012, with a strong background in server-side processing.

education.institution: Monterrey Institute of Technology and Higher Education at Puebla

highlights: Manage a team of 3 developing custom made solutions for clients.
Responsible for backend programming.
Requirement analysis with customers.
Implemented DevOps processes to improve delivery times.
Improved client’s admin panel according to feedback.
Collaborated in the main product’s transition to a new framework.
Integrated to an existing SCRUM team and assisted with new releases.
Adapted existing code to comply with new government regulations.
Helped to correct defects reported by clients.
Developed a system which helped to internal process optimization.
Resolved critical bugs on runtime.
Updated client’s dashboard to improve server-side processing time and usability.
Created a new version of the website that matches the functionality of our app and improved SEO ranking.
Implemented MongoDB for analytics tracking.
Update inventory software with new requirements.
Developed a system for internal control of human resources, expenses and service records for company cars.
Instructed and supervised the use of our inventory software in 25 pharmacies in the state of Puebla, Mexico.
Setup, instructed and supervised another 45 pharmacies in the state of Chiapas, Mexico.
Developed software on a self-managed team.
Developed desktop software in C#.
Created libraries to reuse code.
Adapted existing libraries to new standard (.Net 4.5).
Teached math at rural schools
Coordinated new teachers, assigned groups, created logistics
